doc.name: GRTransform2D
doc.description: An abstract base class for a transform operator of two-dimensional GR shapes. The parameter accumulate determines whether transformations are accumulated or reset during firing.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer
doc.port: The input port for connecting to other GR Actors in the scene graph.
The output port for connecting to other GR Actors in the scene graph.
doc.property: Boolean value determining whether transformations are accumulated or reset for each firing.
